Bill on reserve Bitcoin in Georgia
SB 228 is the second SBR bill from Georgia in the Senate. The first was SB 178, introduced just 10 days ago.
note: It seems that this is the first "party" bill of the SBR competitor.:
- Bill SB 178 has Republican sponsors
- SB 228 belongs to the Democrats
